casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Willie FORREST, III. No. 270A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 11, 2005. Irving Joyner, Durham, for Willie Forrest, III. Kevin L. Anderson, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of January 2005 by ACLU of NC & NCATL for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of January 2005."
